code: import{RESET_SETTINGS,SET_SETTINGS,UPDATE_SETTINGS,TOGGLE_SIDEBAR}from'./types';export var setSettings=function setSettings(data){return{type:SET_SETTINGS,payload:data};};export var updateSettings=function updateSettings(data){return{type:UPDATE_SETTINGS,payload:data};};export var resetSettings=function resetSettings(){return{type:RESET_SETTINGS};};export var toggleSidebar=function toggleSidebar(){return{type:TOGGLE_SIDEBAR};};
